{{disambig-two: }}'''Calimehtar''' was a nobleman of the Royal House of [[Gondor]], the younger son of King [[Calmacil (King of Gondor)

Calimehtar was the younger brother of the famous [[Rómendacil II]]. His direct impact on history was negligible, and indeed he is not mentioned in the annals of his own time at all. He had a lasting legacy, though, in the shape of his grandson [[Castamir]], who used the fact of his descent from Calimehtar as a pretext for usurping the throne of Gondor during the bloody times known as the [[Kin-strife]].<ref>{{App
